memory_analysis.requires_gc_integration: Memory profiling requires --expose-gc flag for accurate heap snapshots

cpu_validation.correlation_threshold_sensitivity: 0.8 correlation threshold may need adjustment based on workload characteristics
cpu_validation.graceful_degradation_detection: Failure rate threshold of 10% requires careful definition of what constitutes a failure

testing_infrastructure.integration_test_complexity: Full validation suite requires careful orchestration of multiple test scenarios
testing_infrastructure.cli_script_dependencies: CLI script has dependencies on validation framework exports and type definitions

implementation_quality.modularity: High - separate validation functions for memory, CPU, and graceful degradation
implementation_quality.test_coverage: Comprehensive - 12 tests covering all validation aspects
implementation_quality.documentation: Complete - CLI script, guide, and comprehensive test suite

performance.efficiency: High - linear regression analysis with optimized algorithms
performance.scalability: Good - handles multiple validation scenarios efficiently
performance.reliability: High - robust error handling and threshold checking
